cab.content: (THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HER BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT)confidential.P.(55) 21022nd December, 1955CABINETRELATIONS WITH SOUTH africa note by the Acting Secretary of the CabinetBy direction of the Prime Minister I circulate an exchange of Christmas messages which he has had with Mr-. Strijdom.(Signed) H.O. HOOPERCabinet Office, S.W.I.22nd December, 1955.COPY NO.To: Prime Minister of United Kingdom, London.From: PretoriaMy colleagues join me in wishing you and your colleagues a happy Christmas and a prosperousNew Year.Prime Minister. To: Prime Minister of South AfricaThank you so much for your telegram ofChristmas greetings. My colleagues and Isend to you and to the members of your government our best wishes for Christmasand the New Year.Anthony Eden
